date.center: Petition for Allowance of Appeal Denied August 30, 1984.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Post Conviction Hearing Act order of the Court of Common Pleas of Bucks County, Criminal Division, No. 3192 of 1974. Before William Hart Rufe, III, Judge. The Superior Court, No. 1847 Philadelphia 1982. Submitted February 3, 1984.
opinion.attorneys: Glenn D. Hains, for appellant; C. Theodore Fritsch, Jr., Assistant District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
opinion.panel: Before CIRILLO, BECK and JOHNSON, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Order denying P.C.H.A. relief is affirmed.Page 596
